dict.acceptation: 方法（ mean的名词复数）；手段；收入；财富；
意味着（ mean的第三人称单数）；引起；打算或注定要某人成为或做某事；

sent.orig: Ferdinand the duck: Christmas? Christmas means dinner, dinner means death! Death means carnage; Christmas means carnage!
sent.trans: 鸭子：圣诞？圣诞意味着晚餐，晚餐意味着死亡！死亡意味着屠杀；圣诞等于屠杀！

sent.orig: Time means life, time means speed, time means strength.
sent.trans: 时间就是生命，时间就是速度，时间就是力量。

sent.orig: Bright means high signal intensity, dark means low, and interm. means intermediate.
sent.trans: 亮指高强度信号，暗指低强度信号，中等指中等强度信号。

sent.orig: Using quantitative means of regulation means that the price adjustment means failure.
sent.trans: 采用量化调控手段意味着价格调整手段失效。

sent.orig: Note: 1 means single phase, 3 means three-phase, G means using in tableland area.
sent.trans: 注：尾号“1”表示单相，“3”表示三相，带“G”表示在高原地区使用；本公司可根据客户的需求定做不同规格尺寸的产品。
